Data: Toss: England have won the toss and will bat

Lee to Strauss, no run huge appeal first up, that ball pitched outside off stump and cut back into Strauss who shouldered arms, the ball hits him in the line of off stump but it was definitely too high to be given lbw
Lee to Strauss, no run Lee bounces Strauss who ducks under it, nice and friendly start from Lee
Lee to Strauss, no run fullish length outside off stump, Strauss plays back and pushes into into covers
Lee to Strauss, no run good length ball on middle and off stump, that rears up at Strauss who stands on the back foot and plays it back to the bowler

Lee to Strauss, 1 run too full from Lee and on middle and leg stump, Strauss moves across and pushes it wide of Brad Hogg at mid-on, he's off the mark with a single, there could have been more but Hogg dived sharply to his left to save runs
Lee to Loye, no run good length outside off stump, Loye plays it to point on the back foot
Johnson to Strauss, 1 run full ball outside off stump, Strauss tries to drive it through cover but the ball swings into him and he gets a bottom edge for a single behind square on the leg side
Johnson to Loye, 1 run full and wide outside off stump, Loye chops down at it and collects a single to third man
Johnson to Strauss, 1 wide short of alength ball but it drifts down leg side and a wide is called, the first extra of the innings
Johnson to Strauss, 1 run fullish length and drifting on to the pads again, flicked down to fine leg for another single
Johnson to Loye, no run pitches on a good length outside off stump and seams away from the right-hander, Loye lets it go
Johnson to Loye, no run and again, identical ball and Loye watches it seam away from him and through to Gilchrist
Johnson to Loye, 1 run hits a good length outside off stump, Loye pushes forward and uses soft hands to guide it wide of Clarke at point for a single
Lee to Loye, no run good length ball pitching just outside off stump and angling into Loye who plays forward and defends back to Lee
Lee to Loye, no run short of a length ball outside off stump, Loye lets it go through to Gilchrist
Lee to Loye, no run a touch too short from Lee and Loye latches on to the width on offer to drive firmly off the back foot to cover, Symonds swoops down on it at cover
Lee to Loye, no run the bouncer fired in at 146kmh, Loye tries to hook it but was in no position whatsoever, he misses and Gilchrist takes it above his head
Lee to Loye, 1 run a fraction short again outside off stump, Loye drives wide of Brad Hogg at mid-off for a single
Lee to Strauss, no run hits a perfect length on Strauss's off stump and moves away from him a touch, Strauss begins to fend at it but pulls his bat out of the way at the last minute
Johnson to Loye, no run defended to backward point off the back foot

Johnson to Loye, SIX runs here she goes! Loye gets down on one knee and picks that up from middle and off stump and sends it soaring over the fine leg fence, that's his trademark slog-smack and that bounced on the roof!
Johnson to Loye, no run fuller length from Johnson outside off stump, the angle from over the wicket takes it across the right-hander and Loye defends towards point
Johnson to Loye, no run fullish length on off stump, Loye leans forward and drives to mid-off
Johnson to Loye, no run pitches outside leg stump angling into the pads, defended on the leg side
Johnson to Loye, no run good length ball on middle and off to finish the over, played back to the bowler on the back foot
Lee to Strauss, no run good length ball on off stump, driven into the covers
Lee to Strauss, no run slower ball on off stump, Strauss spots it and digs it out
Lee to Strauss, 1 run short ball outside off stump, Strauss tries to cut and gets a thickish outside edge past point for a single

Lee to Loye, OUT and he's gone now! wide ball outside off stump, Loye would have been better of letting that go but he went hard at it and the slash resulted in a thick outside edge that flew straight to Gilchrist
Lee to Bell, no run good length ball on off stump, Bell presses on the front foot and defends back to Lee
Lee to Bell, no run good length ball outside off stump, Bell lets it go through to Gilchrist
Johnson to Strauss, no run good length ball but the line is wide outside off stump, it moves away from Strauss who lets it go
Johnson to Strauss, no run much straighter this time and Strauss covers his off stump and defends to the off side
Johnson to Strauss, no run short of a length on off stump, Struass plays back and drives back to the bowler
Johnson to Strauss, no run defended towards point on the back foot
Johnson to Strauss, no run good length ball just outside off stump, Strauss gets forward and tries to drive through the line and mis-times it to mid-on
Johnson to Strauss, no run hits the perfect length outside off stump, not much Strauss can do with that other than get on the front foot and block, Johnson finishes a maiden over
Lee to Bell, 2 runs short ball and Bell tries to pull it away, he doesn't get hold of it and the ball hits the high part of the bat and rolls down to fine leg for two
Lee to Bell, no run good length ball on off stump, defended on the front foot to cover
Lee to Bell, no run good length ball on off and middle stump, Bell gets forward and closes the face to play it to midwicket
Lee to Bell, no run drifting on to the pads, driven to wide mid on
Lee to Bell, no run good length ball on off stump, Bell plays back and defends to cover
Lee to Bell, 1 run a bit too short on middle and leg stump, Bell whips it in front of midwicket for a single
Johnson to Bell, 3 runs fullish length on off and middle, Bell clips it over midwicket but doesn't time it well enough to get the boundary
Johnson to Strauss, 1 run good length ball outside off stump, Strauss gets a thick bottom edge and scampers through for a single
Johnson to Bell, FOUR runs shot! Johnson drops it short and Bell gets into position in a flash and swivel-pulls it to the midwicket fence
Johnson to Bell, 1 run flicked through midwicket for a single
Johnson to Strauss, no run good length ball outside off stump, it's far to close to the body to cut and Strauss gets a bottom edge that misses his stumps
Johnson to Strauss, 1 run fullish ball on off and middle stump, Strauss walks across and flicks it to Brad Hogg at square leg
Clark to Strauss, no run an excellent first ball, pitches outside off and moves away from Strauss who gets drawn forward, he drives loosely at it and gets beaten
Clark to Strauss, FOUR runs strong comeback from Strauss who takes a step and ahalf down the pitch and drives on the up through cover for four, top shot, his best of the morning
Clark to Strauss, 1 wide slower ball but it's mis-directed down leg side
Clark to Strauss, no run good length ball on middle and off stump, Strauss defends back to the bowler
Clark to Strauss, 2 runs too short outside off stump, Strauss waits for it and cuts down to Johnson at third man who fires the return back into Gilchrist, Strauss was quick enough to complete two
Clark to Strauss, no run picthes outside off stump and moves away from the left-hander who lets it go
Clark to Strauss, no run good length ball pitches on off stump and moving away, Strauss defends it to cover
Johnson to Bell, no run good length ball pitching on middle, Bell plays forward and pushes it back to Johnson
Johnson to Bell, no run the nick doesn't carry! Johnson bowled the slower ball wide outside off stump, Bell flayed at it and got a thick nick, the ball bounced just before entering Gilchrist's gloves
Johnson to Bell, 1 run short ball and Bell swivels to get into position to play the pull shot down to deep square leg
Johnson to Strauss, no run short of a length ball outside off stump, Strauss cuts to point
Johnson to Strauss, FOUR runs good length ball on off stump, Strauss shuffles down the pitch and tries to drive, the outside edge flies wide of Hayden at point and races to the third man boundary
Johnson to Strauss, no run defended to point on the front foot
Clark to Bell, 1 run slower ball dragged short and wide outside off stump, Bell spots it, waits and cuts down to third man
Clark to Strauss, no run fuller length on off stump, Strauss gets forward and drives to mid-off
Clark to Strauss, 1 run short of a length outside off stump, Strauss plays it late and cuts in the air wide of slip to third man, this time he doesn't take on Johnson's arm with the second run
Clark to Bell, FOUR runs fantastic shot! That wasn't that short from johnson but Bell siezed his chance in a flash and pulled it powerfully to the midwicket fence
Clark to Bell, 2 runs too short again and this time Bell plays back and flicks it through square leg for two runs
Clark to Bell, no run good length ball on off stump, Bell walks down the pitch, trying to throw Clark off his length, and defends to the off side

Johnson to Strauss, OUT gone! that was too close to cut to third man and Strauss went for it anyway and got a thick edge to Gilchrist, Strauss has been playing that shot repeatedly today and a nick was always on the cards
Johnson to Joyce, no run good length ball on off stump, Joyce defends to point on the back foot
Johnson to Joyce, no run Johnson fires it in on a good length outside off, Joyce lets it go
Johnson to Joyce, FOUR runs short ball outside off stump, Joyce stands tall on the back foot and plays the square drive to perfection, excellent shot to get off the mark
Johnson to Joyce, no run straighter line this time and a better length as well, Joyce defends back to Johnson
Johnson to Joyce, FOUR runs poor ball, a half-volley on leg stump and Joyce clips it neatly off his pads between midwicket and mid-on for four more
Symonds to Bell, 2 runs fullish ball on middle and leg, driven wide of the fielder at mid-on for two
Symonds to Bell, 1 run tucked off the pads to square leg for one
Symonds to Joyce, no run
Symonds to Joyce, no run
Symonds to Joyce, no run
Symonds to Joyce, no run
Clark to Bell, no run fullish length ball on middle and leg stump, Bell moves across and tries to flick but misses
Clark to Bell, 2 runs short of a length ball outside off stump, Bell waits for it and dabs it down to third man
Clark to Bell, 1 run short of a length again outside off stump, Bell guides it down to third man again
Clark to Joyce, no run angling away from the left-hander, pitching outside off stump and moving further away, Joyce lets it go
Clark to Joyce, no run good length ball outside off, Joyce takes two steps down and drives to covers
Clark to Joyce, no run short of a length ball on off stump, defended to point
Symonds to Bell, no run tossed up on off stump, defended back to the bowler
Symonds to Bell, SIX runs Bell uses his feet superbly and lofts over mid-off, he times that superbly and the ball sails over the fence, outstanding timing
Symonds to Bell, 1 run flicked through midwicket for a single
Symonds to Joyce, no run pitches on leg and middle, Joyce pushes forward and gets hit on the pad
Symonds to Joyce, 1 run pushed down the ground past mid-off for a single
Symonds to Bell, 1 run full ball on off and middle, Bell works it down to long-on for a single to end the over
Clark to Bell, no run good length ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler
Clark to Bell, 2 runs slowish delivery, 132kmh, outside off stump, Bell runs it down to third man for two
Clark to Bell, no run short of a length ball outside off stump, Bell moves forward and across and tries to run it fine to third man, he doesn't make contact

Clark to Bell, OUT short and wide outside off stump, Bell looked to continue batting aggressively and cut that hard, he couldn't keep it down and didn't find the gap either, Clarke didn't have to moveat point to take an easy catch
Clark to PD Collingwood, no run good length ball outside off stump, Collingwood cover drives on the up but doesn't pierce the infield
Clark to PD Collingwood, no run good length yet again but it's wider outside the off stump, Collingwood watchfully lets it go
Symonds to Joyce, no run defended on the back foot to the off side
Symonds to Joyce, 1 run sharp single taken to midwicket
Symonds to PD Collingwood, no run defended to midwicket on the back foot
Symonds to PD Collingwood, 1 wide fired down leg side, wide called
Symonds to PD Collingwood, no run chipped back to the bowler, it falsl just short of Symonds who tries to dive forward to take the catch
Symonds to PD Collingwood, 1 run dabbed short on the off side for a single, Symonds sprints to try and affect the run-out but doesn't hit the stumps at the batsman's end
Symonds to Joyce, no run defended on the off side on the font foot
Clark to PD Collingwood, no run good length ball on off stump, defended towards cover point on the back foot
Clark to PD Collingwood, no run short of a length ball too wide outside off stump, Collingwood uses the width to drive off the back foot but hits it straight to cover

Clark to PD Collingwood, 1 run short of a length again on off stump, Collingwood takes a step down the track and tries to drive, the length isn't right for the shot and he gets a thick outside edge down to third man
Clark to Joyce, no run defended to point on the back foot, Clark is hitting a good length consistently, just needs to fine tune his radar
Clark to Joyce, no run short of a length again and Joyce steps down the track and gets cramped for room, he works it off his hips to midwicket
Clark to Joyce, no run full and straight, the attempted yorker, Joyce digs it out to mid-on
Symonds to PD Collingwood, no run tossed up on middle and leg, Colling steps down but isn't to the pitch of the ball, defended to midwicket
Symonds to PD Collingwood, no run this time he stays in his crease and works it to midwicket
Symonds to PD Collingwood, 1 run Collingwood uses his feet to convert it into a full toss and flicks to deep midwicket for a single
Symonds to Joyce, 1 wide slips down leg side, wide called
Symonds to Joyce, no run Joyce uses his feet this time and isn't to the pitch of the ball
Symonds to Joyce, no run pushed to midwicket on the front foot
Symonds to Joyce, 1 run driven to mid-off where Ponting dives to save runs, the ball rebounds off his body and they run a single
Lee to Joyce, no run good length on off and middle stump, defended on the back foot

Lee to Joyce, OUT it wasn't short enough to pull and the line was outside off stump, Joyce tried to force it through midwicket and ended up getting a top edge to Mitchell Johnson at mid-on who took a comfortable catch, a very rash shot and England are slipping as they have done in previous matches in this series
Lee to PD Collingwood, no run good length ball on off stump, pushed to point
Lee to PD Collingwood, no run defended on the back foot to the off side
Lee to PD Collingwood, no run short of a length ball outside off stump, Collingwood tries to cut that but the ball keeps a little low and beats the bottom edge
Lee to PD Collingwood, no run short of a length outside off stump, Collingwood waits on the back foot and punches to cover, Lee starts his second spell with a wicket maiden
Hogg to Flintoff, no run pitches on off stump and spins into Flintoff who closes the face and plays it to midwicket
Hogg to Flintoff, no run tossed up on off stump, Flintoff leans forward and clips it to midwicket
Hogg to Flintoff, 1 run flighted ball on off stump, Flintoff gets forward again and tries to drive but gets a inside edge behind square on the leg side
Hogg to Dalrymple, no run quicker ball outside off stump, Dalrymple gets on the front foot and blocks
Hogg to Dalrymple, no run floated through the air outside off stump, that spins back into Dalrymple who lets it go
Hogg to Dalrymple, no run defended on the front foot back to the bowler, Hogg finishes a tidy first over
Lee to Flintoff, no run fullish length swinging back into Flintoff's off stump, driven on the front foot to mid-on
Lee to Flintoff, no run fullish again from Lee outside off stump, Flintoff punches firmly to mid-off
Lee to Flintoff, no run short ball outside off stump, Flintoff cuts hard in front of point where Clarke runs across to his right and picks up one-handed
Lee to Flintoff, no run good length ball on off stump, defended on the off side
Lee to Flintoff, no run good length delivery on off stump, Flintoff gets behind the line and defends towards cover
Lee to Flintoff, no run good length again from Lee on Flintoff's off stump, the batsman covers the line and meets the ball with a straight bat
Hogg to Dalrymple, 1 run swept down to fine leg for a single, Dalrymple gets off the mark
Hogg to Flintoff, 1 run full ball outside off stump, Flintoff drives to long off for one
Hogg to Dalrymple, 1 run driven through covers for another single
Hogg to Flintoff, 1 run drifting down leg side, clipped to short fine leg for one
Hogg to Dalrymple, 1 run defended on the off side on the front foot, they scamper a single behind point
Hogg to Flintoff, 1 run fullish length on off stump, driven to long off for a single to end the over
Johnson to Flintoff, no run short of a good length delivery, angled across the right-hander and Flintoff watchfully cuts it away straight to the fielder at point
Johnson to Flintoff, 2 runs good length delivery outside the off stump and Flintoff drives it away in the air and well wide of the fielder at point. Not sure if he was in full control there.
Johnson to Flintoff, 2 runs width offered outside the off stump, steered down to third man
Johnson to Flintoff, no run defended outside the off stump

Johnson to Flintoff, FOUR runs edged and through! good length delivery outside the off stump, excellent line and length and Flintoff is sucked into the drive, ball clips the outside edge and flies through to the gap between Gilchrist and Ponting at first slip. Close call that
Johnson to Flintoff, no run driven off the front-foot and the ball goes straight to the fielder at cover
Hogg to Dalrymple, 2 runs goes for the reverse sweep and connects well, easy two down to third man
Hogg to Dalrymple, 1 run 100 comes up! tossed up on the stump, Dalrymple lunges forward to defend and the ball rolls away off the inside edge
Hogg to Flintoff, no run tight delivery on the stumps, defended watchfully
Hogg to Flintoff, no run again tossed up and turning in, not much turn but enough to pay on the batsman's mind. Flintoff gets forward and defends it down watchfully
Hogg to Flintoff, 1 run tucked away off the back-foot to the square leg region
Hogg to Dalrymple, no run defended on the front-foot and that's the way it's going to be for sometime, so now is the best time to take that coffee break, if you want
Johnson to Flintoff, no run good length delivery on the stumps, defended wathfully
Johnson to Flintoff, 1 run clipped away off the pads to the midwicket region
Johnson to Dalrymple, no run bit wide outside the off stump and Dalrymple pushes at it, a nothing shot and the ball sails through to the keeper
Johnson to Dalrymple, no run and again! closer to the off stump line on this occasion. Dalrymple once again goes fishing outside the off stump and once again the ball zips past the outside edge
Johnson to Dalrymple, 1 run played to cover, Clarke shy at the bowler's end misses the stumps and the ball goes through

Johnson to Flintoff, OUT and gone! fuller length delivery outside the off stump, fairly innocuous delivery. Flintoff drives away from his body and the ball goes straight to Pointing at wide first slip. Could have left it alone but Flintoff couldn't resist going for the drive and that's sums up England's performance
Hogg to Dalrymple, no run left alone outside the off stump
Hogg to Dalrymple, no run turned away towards square leg
Hogg to Dalrymple, 2 runs fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Dalrymple jams his bat down and the ball races away off the outside edge
Hogg to Dalrymple, 1 run worked away behind square on the leg side for an easy single
Hogg to Nixon, no run tossed up outside the off stump, Nixon walks down the track and defends it down on the off side
Hogg to Nixon, no run bit of width offered outside the off stump, Nixon goes for the cut and the ball rips through to the keeper
Johnson to Dalrymple, no run good length delivery outside the off stump and Dalrymple leaves it through to the keeper

Johnson to Dalrymple, OUT Johnson strikes again! two in two overs and England's slump continues. Perfect line and length to the right-hander - good length, pitched close to the off stump line and shaping in late. Dalrymple had to play at it and the edge goes straight to Gilchrist behind the stumps.
Johnson to Plunkett, no run excellent delivery first up and Plunkett is turned inside out, just missed the outside edge by a whisker. Johnson is on fire here
Johnson to Plunkett, no run good length delivery outside the off stum, slanting away and Plunkett is beaten outside the off stump

Johnson to Plunkett, no run short of a good length delivery, bit of a surprise delivery and Plunkett was clueless, horrible little fend and the ball pops up on the leg side, luckily for him Johnson fails to get there in time

Johnson to Plunkett, OUT that's the end of that! Johnson once again drags it short and Plunkett plays the 'sitting duck act' to perfection, ball clips the shoulder of the bat and lobs up towards point. Clarke moves in quickly and makes no mistake. As simple as that
Hogg to Nixon, no run defended outside the off stump
Hogg to Nixon, 1 run clipped away off the pads to deep square leg
Hogg to Tremlett, no run tossed up on the stumps and Tremlett defends off the back-foot
Hogg to Tremlett, no run fuller delivery on the stumps, Tremlett pushes forward to defend and ends up with an inside edge on to the pad, appeal turned down

Hogg to Tremlett, OUT another one bites the dust and this time it's the googly that does the damage. Flat and on the middle and off stump line, turning away evers-so-slightly. Tremlett pushes forward to defend and the edge is produced. White at first slip swoops low down and make a hard catch look easy
Hogg to Panesar, no run tossed up delivery, defended on the front-foot
Johnson to Nixon, no run good length delivery outside the off stump, defended watchfully
Johnson to Nixon, no run play and a miss, ball rolls away off the pad
Johnson to Nixon, no run good length delivery, coming in with the angle. Nixon pushes forward to defend and ends up with an inside edge on to the pad
Johnson to Nixon, 1 run short ball outside the off stump and Nixon pulls it away to deep square leg for a single
Johnson to Panesar, no run bit wide outside the off stump and Panesar shoulders arms
Johnson to Panesar, no run good length delivery outside the off stump, better line but not enough to make Panesar play at it. End of a decent spell from Johnson
Symonds to Flintoff, no run defended on the front foot on the off side
Symonds to Flintoff, no run Flintoff gets on the back foot and pushes it back to Symonds
Symonds to Flintoff, 1 run worked through midwicket off the back foot for a single
Symonds to PD Collingwood, no run Collingwood usees his feet to step downthe pitch and defend to cover
Symonds to PD Collingwood, 1 wide fired down leg side, another wide
Symonds to PD Collingwood, OUT another one falls softly! Symonds tosses it up outside off stump, Collingwood steps down, he isn
Symonds to Dalrymple, no run slightly short in length, worked off the pads to square leg
Lee to Flintoff, 1 run full length on middle and leg, Flintoff clips it off his pads for a single
Lee to Dalrymple, no run pitches on a good length outside off stump, Dalrymple lets it go through to Gilchrist
Lee to Dalrymple, no run good length ball pitching just outside off stump and angling into Dalrymple who plays forward and defends

Lee to Dalrymple, no run full toss, Dalrymple misses it completely aas he tries to flick and gets hit on the pad, Lee roars an appeal but the umpire says not out, Hawk-Eye says that was just clipping leg stump
Lee to Dalrymple, no run Lee fires in a short one that Dalrymple leaves alone outside off stump
Lee to Dalrymple, no run defended on the front foot to the off side
Hogg to Nixon, no run swept away to deep fine leg, there was a single on offer but Nixon decides not to go for it
Hogg to Nixon, no run tossed up outside the off stump and Nixon leaves it through to the keeper
Hogg to Nixon, 1 run fuller and on the pads and Nixon sweeps it down to fine leg, run hard looking for the second but Lee hurtles across in the deep and cuts it off
Hogg to Panesar, no run left alone outside the off stump
Hogg to Panesar, no run inside edge on to the pad and the ball pops up on the leg side
Hogg to Panesar, no run tossed up outside the off stump, turning away. Panesar stays back and taps it away towards point
Lee to Nixon, no run good length delivery outside the off stump, defended on the front-foot
Lee to Nixon, no run slightly short and angling across the left-hander. Nixon watches it all the way into the keeper's glove
Lee to Nixon, no run closer to the off stump line and Nixon is made to defend
Lee to Nixon, no run good length delivery, in the channel outside the off stump and Nixon defends it off the back-foot
Lee to Nixon, 1 run punched away off the back-foot to the deep cover region
Lee to Panesar, no run bowled from round the stumps. Pitched up outside the off stump, Panesar has a small little dab at it and the ball zips past the outside edge
Hogg to Nixon, no run left alone outside the off stump
Hogg to Nixon, no run slogged away towards midwicket

Hogg to Nixon, OUT Well as you wish Binoy! tossed up on the middle and off stump line, Nixon pushes forward to defend and the ball spoons up off the leading edge. Hogg shuffles across and makes no mistake. Done and dusted in 34.3 overs

This is the lowest total at Adelaide Oval since March 1992 - Well done England. Once again there is nothing to write home about, There was no intent from England's batsmen and they threw away their wickets with loose shots. Australian bowler's cashed in heavily and 111 is what they need to get when they come out to bat.
Players are back and it's going to be Plunkett to Gilchrist.
Plunkett to Gilchrist, no run good length delivery outside the off stump, hint of away swing and Gilchirst leaves it through to the keeper
Plunkett to Gilchrist, no run good length delivery, 144 kmps and Gilchirst edges it away towards backward point
Plunkett to Gilchrist, 2 runs slightly fuller in length, Gilchrist goes back and drives it away through the gap between cover and point. 109 more to get
Plunkett to Gilchrist, 1 run punched away off the back-foot to the cover region, excellent placement and they scamper through for a single
Plunkett to Hayden, no run good length delivery outside the off stump and Hayden drives it down to mid-off. Watchfully played
Plunkett to Hayden, 1 leg bye full and drifting down the leg side, Hayden fails to make contact but the ball rolls away off the pad to the backward square leg region
Tremlett to Hayden, no run good length delivery outside the off stump, hint of swing. Hayden reads it well and leaves it through to the keeper
Tremlett to Hayden, no run pitched up outside the off stump and Hayden drives it straight to the fielder at mid-off
Tremlett to Hayden, no run quicker delivery on the middle and leg stump line, Hayden gets forward and flicks but fails to make contact, ball thuds into the pad and pops up on the track
Tremlett to Hayden, 1 wide wayward delivery down the leg side
Tremlett to Hayden, no run good length delivery outside the off stump, shaping away from the left-hander and Hayden leaves it through to the keeper

Tremlett to Hayden, no run fuller length delivery on the middle and off stump line, again the ball swinging away late. Hayden was caught on the wrong foot but his cross bat push makes contact and the ball rolls away towards midwicket
Tremlett to Hayden, no run another line and length delivery, defended on the front-foot
Plunkett to Gilchrist, 1 leg bye off the pads to the short fine leg region
Plunkett to Hayden, no run short of a good length delivery outside the off stump and Hayden leaves it through to the keeper
Plunkett to Hayden, no run good length delivery outside the off stump and Hayden leaves it through to the keeper.
Plunkett to Hayden, 1 wide wide delivery outside the off stump
Plunkett to Hayden, no run short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, slanting away. Hayden shoulders arms

Plunkett to Hayden, no run fuller length delivery outside the off stump and Hayden drives it down to mid-on. Not a well timed shot and the ball rolled away off the inner half of the bat. He is struggling a bit here
Plunkett to Hayden, no run good length delivery outside the off stump, close to the off stump line and Hayden leaves it through to the keeper
Tremlett to Gilchrist, 1 wide another wide delivery outside the off stump
Tremlett to Gilchrist, no run good length delivery on the stumps and Gilchrist works it away towards midwicket
Tremlett to Gilchrist, no run punched away towards cover
Tremlett to Gilchrist, no run pitched up outside the off stump. Gilchirst drives and drives well, diving stop by the fielder at cover cuts off a certain boundary
Tremlett to Gilchrist, 3 runs pitched up on the pads, wrong line and Gilchrist drives it past the diving fielder at midwicket. Joyce with the long chase
Tremlett to Hayden, no run left alone outside the off stump
Tremlett to Hayden, no run forced away off the front-foot to the mid-on region. Again bit of a cross batted shot, he is clearly struggling here
Plunkett to Gilchrist, FOUR runs slightly short and slanting across the left-hander. Gilchrist rocks back and punches it away through the gap between mid-off and cover. Australia on the move
Plunkett to Gilchrist, no run bowled from round the wicket and Plunkett pitches it up wide outside the off stump. Gilchirst jabs his bat at it but fails to make contact
Plunkett to Gilchrist, FOUR runs another sweetly timed cover drive, this time off the front-foot and the ball just raced away to the fence. Nothing more than a punch
Plunkett to Gilchrist, FOUR runs four more! good length delivery outside the off stump, Gilchrist quickly gets into a good position and drills it through cover point. Fantastic shot
Plunkett to Gilchrist, no run better line and length, defended on the back-foot

Plunkett to Gilchrist, FOUR runs take that! pitched up outside the off stump and Gilchrist smokes it to the long-off fence. Hit on the up and the ball just rocketed over the bowler's head. End of a massive over for Australia
Tremlett to Hayden, 2 runs off the mark with an inside edge to deep backward square leg
Tremlett to Hayden, no run defended outside the off stump
Tremlett to Hayden, (no ball) good length delivery outside the off stump and Hayden leaves it through to the bowler

Tremlett to Hayden, 1 run good length delviery outside the off stump, Hayden goes for the drive and once again ends up with an inside edge on to his pad. It's a different story all together at the other end.
Tremlett to Gilchrist, 1 run much better shot. Good length delivery and Hayden nicely drives it down to mid-off
Tremlett to Hayden, no run punched down to mid-off, the fielder is bit late to attack the ball. Gilchrist calls late but makes it across safely. Total cricket
Tremlett to Hayden, no run defended on the back-foot
Flintoff to Gilchrist, no run good length delivery outside the off styump, defended
Flintoff to Gilchrist, no run driven down to mid-off. No room for a single there

Flintoff to Gilchrist, OUT driven straight back and Flintoff gets a touch on it. Gilchrist called for the single and kept running but Hayden was busy ball watching. Plunkett moved across to his left at mid-off and fired in the throw at the keeper's end. Nixon ran in and dragged the ball on to the stumps. Perfect mix-up.
Flintoff to Ponting, no run good length delivery outside the off stump, defended watchfully
Flintoff to Ponting, 2 runs off-cutter and Ponting works it away behind square on the leg side
Flintoff to Ponting, 1 run driven in the air and well wide of the diving fielder at point
Tremlett to Ponting, FOUR runs good length delivery, drifting on to the pads and Ponting clips it away nicely to the fine leg fence
Tremlett to Ponting, no run good length delivery outside the off stump and Ponting defends it on the front-foot
Tremlett to Ponting, no run good length delivery outside the off stump and Ponting shoulders arms
Tremlett to Ponting, no run driven off the front-foot and Tremlett takes it on his follow through
Tremlett to Ponting, 2 runs again drifting on to the pads and Ponting clips it away well in front of square leg

Tremlett to Ponting, no run good length and cutting in, almost the perfect delivery. Ponting shuffles across in an attempt to work it away on the leg side but fails to make contact. Loud appeal for lbw turned down. Probably hit outside the line of the off stump
Flintoff to Hayden, no run defended on the front-foot
Flintoff to Hayden, no run punched back to the bowler
Flintoff to Hayden, no run good length delivery outside the off stump and Hayden drives it away towards cover
Flintoff to Hayden, no run short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Hayden gets right behind the line and defends it down to mid-off
Flintoff to Hayden, no run nice little dab down to mid-off
Flintoff to Hayden, no run maiden! good length delivery, again close to the off stump line and Hayden punches it down to mid-off
Plunkett to Ponting, 1 run flicked away off the pads to deep midwicket

Plunkett to Hayden, FOUR runs welcome back Hayden! good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, bit too straight and Hayden finds the gap between mid-on and midwicket. Pefect timing and the placement was spot on
Plunkett to Hayden, no run defended outside the off stump
Plunkett to Hayden, 1 run good length delivery outside the off stump, Hayden walks forward and taps it away towards cover, early call and a quick single is added to the total
Plunkett to Ponting, 1 run turned away off the front-foot to the midwicket region, nicely placed into the gap between mid-on and midwicket
Plunkett to Hayden, no run driven down to mid-off, again not a well timed shot and the ball rolled away off the inner half of the bat
Flintoff to Ponting, no run good length delivery, looked like the ball stopped a bit after hitting the deck. Ponting is early into the defensive push and he ends up with an inside edge onto his pad
Flintoff to Ponting, no run driven off the back-foot, straight to the fielder at cover
Flintoff to Ponting, no run tight delivery, right on the middle and off stump line. Ponting gets well forward and defends it down on the leg side

Flintoff to Ponting, no run pitched up and Ponting drives it straight back. Flintoff fails to take it cleanly and the ball rolls down to mid-on. Ponting takes off for a single but once again Hayden is not interested but on this occasion no damage is done
Flintoff to Ponting, 1 run good length delivery and Ponting taps it away through cover point
Flintoff to Hayden, no run defended on the back-foot

Panesar to Ponting, 1 run fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Ponting gets well inside the line, opens the face of the bat and drives it away through covers. 50 comes up for Australia - they need another 61 to wrap this up.
Panesar to Hayden, 1 run turned away off the back-foot to the midwicket region, easy single
Panesar to Ponting, no run flat delivery on the stumps and Ponting ends up with and inside edge
Panesar to Ponting, 1 run edge and dropped! Ponting drives off the back-foot and ends up with a thick edge. Collingwood at first slip fails to hold on to the fairly hard chance.
Panesar to Hayden, 1 run worked away towards midwicket
Panesar to Ponting, 1 run slightly short, Ponting goes right back, making use of the depth of the crease and drive it away through cover
Plunkett to Ponting, no run full and straight, Ponting leans forward and drives firmly to Panesar at mid-on
Plunkett to Ponting, FOUR runs too full again and this time the line is middle and leg stump, Ponting leans across on his front foot and clips it wide of Panesar at mid-on for four
Plunkett to Ponting, FOUR runs Plunkett doesn't learn and again drifts on to the pads, Ponting moves across and flicks it through midwicket for four more
Plunkett to Ponting, no run short of a length on off stump, Ponting stands on the back foot and defends back to the bowler
Plunkett to Ponting, FOUR runs pitches short of a length and drifts down leg side again, Ponting leans across and clips it fine down to the fine-leg fence
Plunkett to Ponting, no run flicked off the pads to midwicket yet again
Panesar to Hayden, 1 run flicked off his hips to square leg
Panesar to Ponting, 1 run tossed up on off stump, Ponting gets on the front foot and pushes into the covers
Panesar to Hayden, no run fired through quickly outside off stump, Hayden gets forward and lets it go
Panesar to Hayden, no run defended on the front foot on the off side
Panesar to Hayden, 1 run fullish length on off and middle stump, Hayden pushes it to long-on for a single
Panesar to Ponting, no run good length pitching on off stump, Ponting reaches out on the front foot and blocks
Tremlett to Hayden, no run short of a length ball angling across Hayden from over the wicket, Hayden tries to pull but doesn't time it well, ends up flat-batting it back to Tremlett
Tremlett to Hayden, 1 run good length ball on off stump, pushed past the bowler for a quick single
Tremlett to Ponting, 1 run short of a length ball angling into middle and leg, Ponting walks across and flicks through square leg
Tremlett to Hayden, no run short of alength again outside Hayden's off stump, he stands on the back foot and punches to short cover
Tremlett to Hayden, no run slower ball outside off stump, 120khm, Hayden defends to midwicket
Tremlett to Hayden, no run another slower ball, 117 kmh, Hayden lets it go outside his off stump
Panesar to Ponting, 1 run good length ball on middle and off, Ponting pushes it wide off the fielder at mid-on for a single
Panesar to Hayden, 2 runs flicked to square leg where a teriible mis-field from Plunkett allows runs
Panesar to Hayden, no run defended back to the bowler on the front foot
Panesar to Hayden, no run tossed up nicely on off stump, Hayden gets forward and blocks, he's struggled to time the ball today
Panesar to Hayden, no run defended to midwicket on the front foot
Panesar to Hayden, no run tossed up on off and middle stump, Hayden gets forward and blocks solidly
Tremlett to Ponting, no run short of a length on off and middle, Ponting uses the angle into him to move across and work it to midwicket
Tremlett to Ponting, no run good length ball angling into Ponting from outsid off stump, defended to midwicket
Tremlett to Ponting, no run good length ball on off stump, Ponting plays it back to the bowler on the back foot
Tremlett to Ponting, no run short of a length ball outside off stump, Ponting gets forward and tries to defend, he gets an inside edge back past his stumps
Tremlett to Ponting, no run excellent length from Tremlett, he keeps Ponting on then back foot and induces another inside edge on to the pad
Tremlett to Ponting, 1 run good length ball outside off stump, Ponting gets well forward and pushes it into covers
Panesar to Ponting, 1 run tossed up on off stump, Ponting dabs it into the covers and sets off at frantic pace for the single
Panesar to Hayden, 1 run fullish length on middle and leg stump, Hayden clips it wide of mid-on for a single

Panesar to Ponting, 2 runs pushed into the covers for another sharp single, there might have been a close call if the fielder had hit at the batsman's end but the throw is poor and they steal an overthrow
Panesar to Ponting, no run defended on the off side on the front foot
Panesar to Ponting, no run flatter ball on middle and leg stump, Ponting moves across and tries to flick but misses
Panesar to Ponting, no run defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Tremlett to Hayden, 1 run good length on off stump, Hayden just taps it back past the bowler for a quick single
Tremlett to Ponting, FOUR runs poor ball, short and drifting down leg side, Ponting swivels and guides it down to the fine leg fence, four more, Australia march on
Tremlett to Ponting, no run short of a length outside off stump, Ponting latches on to the width and square drives to Dalrymple to point
Tremlett to Ponting, 1 run good length angling into off and middle stump, Ponting dabs it in front of midwicket for a single
Tremlett to Hayden, no run good length again, angling across Hayden, he gets on the front foot and defends towards cover
Tremlett to Hayden, no run defended on the front foot towards mid-off
Panesar to Ponting, no run defended to backward point
Panesar to Ponting, no run Ponting drively firmly back past the bowler, the ball hits the stumps at the other end
Panesar to Ponting, 2 runs flicked off the pads through square leg
Panesar to Ponting, no run good length ball on off and middle, Ponting gets a stride in and blocks
Panesar to Ponting, 1 run worked off the pads through square leg for one
Panesar to Hayden, 1 run pushes down the ground to mid-on for another single
Tremlett to Hayden, no run good length again on off stump from Tremlett, Hayden pushes to mid-on but says NO to the single
Tremlett to Hayden, no run Hayden takes a step down and pushes it to covers
Tremlett to Hayden, 1 run too short this time, Hayden waits for it and flicks it wide off the fielder at mid-on for a single
Tremlett to Ponting, no run Ponting attempts to pull a short ball but he is very early on the shot and gets a bottom edge to the off side
Tremlett to Ponting, no run good length delivery on middle stump, Ponting leans across and drives to mid-on
Tremlett to Ponting, no run slower offcutter this time, Tremlett bowls that well and Ponting moves forward to defend
Dalrymple to Hayden, no run pushed through quickly on middle and leg, defended to midwicket
Dalrymple to Hayden, no run short of a length on off stump, Hayden gets forward and pushes into the covers
Dalrymple to Hayden, no run defended back to the bowler on the front foot
Dalrymple to Hayden, 1 run fullish length pitching outside leg stump and spinning across Hayden who gets forward and pushes to midwicket
Dalrymple to Ponting, 1 run short ball outside off stump, Ponting waits on the back foot and drives through cover
Dalrymple to Hayden, 2 runs flicked off the pads through square leg for two to end the over, Dalrymple is pushing them through fast and flat
Tremlett to Ponting, 1 run full ball outside off stump, Ponting gets forward and launches into a powerful cover drive that beats Ian Bell
Tremlett to Hayden, no run slower ball shaping away from Hayden, he lets it go through to Nixon
Tremlett to Hayden, FOUR runs short ball and Hayden steps down the track and muscles it wide of Panesar at mid-on for a boundary
Tremlett to Hayden, no run short of a length ball on off stump, defended back down the pitch
Tremlett to Hayden, 2 runs straying on to the pads, Hayden flicks it through square leg for two more, Australia move on to 101 and need just ten more
Tremlett to Hayden, 2 runs take that! Short and wide outside off stump, Hayden slaps it off the back foot to deep cover
Dalrymple to Ponting, no run full and wide outside off stump, Ponting tries to slam it through covers but gets an inside edge back to the bowler
Dalrymple to Ponting, no run defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Dalrymple to Ponting, 1 wide slips down leg side this time, wide called
Dalrymple to Ponting, no run defended on the front foot to cover
Dalrymple to Ponting, 1 run short ball pitching outside off stumpa nd turning into Ponting who goes on the back foot and punches through cover
Dalrymple to Hayden, no run full ball on leg stump, Hayden pushes it off his pads to midwicket
Dalrymple to Hayden, no run full ball on middle and leg stump, Hayden drives to mid-on
Tremlett to Ponting, FOUR runs Ponting latches on to a short ball and pulls it high and far over midwicket, that's four of them
Tremlett to Ponting, no run defended on the off side on the front foot
Tremlett to Ponting, 2 runs short ball yet again, Ponting gets on the front foot and slaps it in front of midwicket to pick up the winning runs, that's also his fifty, well played Punter!
Thank you for tuning into Cricinfo's live coverage of this match. We'll be back on Sunday when Australia take on New Zealand at Perth. Do join us then. Have a good weekend. Cheers!

Australia have beaten England by nine wickets and even that doesn't put in perspective the magnitude of this victory. They've also won a bonus point in the process. Mitchell Johnson wins the Man-of-the-Match award for his searing spell of 4 for 45.
Australia won by 9 wickets (with 153 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Mitchell Johnson, AUS
